definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Collect mulberry day asks to show autopsy to Limeng immediately.
sentences.chinese: 羅桑天立刻要求對李夢露屍體解剖。

sentences.english: The autopsy showed Torrington was an ill man when he died.
sentences.chinese: 屍體解剖表明託林通死的時候正患病。

sentences.english: A coroner's spokesman said an autopsy would be performed laterthis week.
sentences.chinese: 一個驗屍官的發言人說本週末將進行屍體解剖。

sentences.english: No post-mortem examination was performed, and Jobs was buried on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 喬布斯死後並未進行屍體解剖，並於上週五下葬。
